data.title: Robert Ludlum: Signed Books & Author Biography
data.meta_description: Robert Ludlum was an American author of twenty-seven thriller novels, most famously The Bourne Trilogy series. Get his signed titles online at VJ Books!
data.text:
VJ Books Presents Author Robert Ludlum!

BOURNE AGAIN by John Hutchinson, VJ Books (August 5, 2016) - "When Robert Ludlum died 15 years ago our hopes for another book featuring Jason Bourne where seriously dampened. However, you can't keep a good character down, and Bourne has grown far beyond the three original Ludlum titles.

Under the watchful eye of Eric Lustbader, the Bourne series has grown to epic proportions with the release of ten _ count them _ ten novels: The Bourne Legacy (2004), The Bourne Betrayal (2007), The Bourne Sanction (2008), The Bourne Deception (2009), The Bourne Objective (2010), The Bourne Dominion (2011), The Bourne Imperative (2012), The Bourne Retribution (2013), The Bourne Ascendancy (2014), and, just released, The Bourne Enigma (2016).

The first attempt to bring Bourne to the screen was in the long forgotten made for TV movie starring Richard Chamberlain, previously known as Dr. Kildare turned Shogun. It was probably the best TV spy movies made, winning a golden globe nomination, but made for TV movies don't get many sequels.

In classic Hollywood form Bourne returned in 2002 with superstar Matt Damon as the man from Treadstone. The Bourne Supremacy followed in 2004 and The Bourne Ultimatum in 2007.

In 2012 The Bourne Legacy hit the big screen with black ops operative number 5, Aaron Cross played by Jeremy Renner. In an effort to shutdown the black ops unit, the CIA trys to terminate Cross, and he goes on the run, just like Bourne did two years previously.

Jason Bourne. You know his name, and you know what to expect in this growing franchise: stupendous car chases, brutal hand-to-hand combat, and a big CIA control room where tech wizards watch his every move

around the world. The just released Bourne flick has loads of all that, making it a joyful seat-gripping action flick. In this sequel, Bourne aspires to reflect the real dangers of unchecked technological power in the modern world. Matt Damon turns in another superb performance.

As Treadstone fades into ruins, Jason Bourne remains the one asset that I am sure Bob Ludlum would love to know. Don't miss Eric Lustbader's The Bourne Enigma, and catch Jason Bourne, starring Matt Damon, at a theater near you."
